actionConfiguration.body: select u.name ,u.group,delay/total_task as delay_rate, total_task , finish_count, delay,plan_cost ,real_cost from qjl_user u left join (select id,处理人,sum(预估工时) plan_cost,sum(完成工时) real_cost,COUNT(*) as total_task,sum(case when date_add(预计结束,interval 1 day)<完成时间 then 1 when 预计结束<now() and 状态<>"已完成" then 1 else 0 end) as delay,sum(case when 状态="已完成" then 1 else 0 end) as finish_count from task_qjl_1  group by 处理人 ) as c on u.name=c.处理人 order by u.group desc ,delay_rate asc;
